intelligence_grade_justification: Limited data richness. ALC does not publish pricing online. No Facebook reviews found. No Instagram account specific to Georgia office. Course details confirmed but pricing is entirely opaque — contact required for all fees.

company_profile.address: 35A Ilia Chavchavadze Ave., Lane 1, Building 6, Entrance II, Floor II, Tbilisi, Georgia 0162
company_profile.note: Partnership between American Councils Tbilisi and local entity. Two separate websites exist.

toefl_preparation.note: Confirmed offering — core product. No pricing found.

college_counselling.description: ALC provides college counselling services alongside test prep
college_counselling.note: Unique offering — combines test prep with university application support

opit_program.name: Overseas Professional and Intercultural Training (OPIT)
opit_program.note: Separate from language teaching but part of same organization

all_courses.note: NO pricing information found on either website or in any search result. ALC appears to operate on a contact-for-pricing model. One tangential data point: a related event cost 50 GEL per participant including materials and lunch.

pricing_intelligence.vs_ih_tbilisi: Unknown — cannot compare without pricing data
pricing_intelligence.assessment: The complete absence of public pricing is itself a signal: either (a) they are a premium provider who screens clients, (b) pricing varies significantly by program, or (c) they are grant-funded and pricing is not their primary revenue model.

instagram.assessment: No Georgia-specific Instagram account found. Parent org has 12K followers globally.

facebook.note: Very limited social media footprint for the Tbilisi operation

social_media_intelligence.digital_presence_score: 3/10 — Two websites (confusing), no social media, no content marketing, no online booking

reviews_intelligence.assessment: Zero publicly accessible reviews found. This is a significant red flag for customer intelligence — either very small operation, or reviews exist on platforms not indexed by search.

target_segments: International community in Tbilisi needing multiple languages
Students seeking college counselling for US universities
value_propositions: College counselling bundled with test prep
positioning.brand_positioning: Premium niche — US-aligned test prep and college counselling
positioning.differentiation: Only provider combining test prep + college counselling. American accent/culture focus vs British (IH/BC).

strengths: Unique niche: TOEFL + SAT + GRE + college counselling under one roof
American Councils institutional backing — credibility for US university applicants
Native American speaker teachers — appeals to US-oriented students
Multi-language offerings — serves diverse Tbilisi expat community
weaknesses: Zero public pricing — maximum friction for price-shopping customers
No online presence beyond basic websites
No reviews found anywhere — no social proof
No Instagram, minimal Facebook — invisible to younger demographics
Narrow product range — no kids programs, no corporate training visible
strategic_vulnerabilities: EMCAN offers the same test prep range (TOEFL, SAT, GRE) at published prices — direct competitor
Preply tutors offer TOEFL/SAT prep from $3/hr — massive price advantage
Complete digital invisibility means they lose every customer who researches online first
If American Councils funding changes, the operation may be fragile

marketing_tactics.assessment: Appears to operate entirely through institutional channels and word-of-mouth. No observable marketing activities.
